entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Humboldt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
